spell_tooltip.description: Removes all harmful magical effects from yourself and all nearby allies within 10 yards, and sends them back to their original caster if possible.

Transform to demon form, moving at 175% increased speed for 3 sec, knocking down all enemies in your path and dealing 17795.3 Physical damage.

During Demonic Trample you are unaffected by snares but cannot cast spells or use your normal attacks. Shares charges with Infernal Strike.
Dealing damage increases your movement speed by 15% for 3 sec.
Remove all snares and vault away. Nearby enemies take 26,880 Physical damage.
Infernal Strike gains an additional charge.

Place a Sigil of Misery at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

Causes all enemies affected by the sigil to cower in fear, disorienting them for 17 sec.
Increases maximum Fury by 20.
The healing of Shattered Souls is increased by 10%.
Throw Glaive ricochets to 1 additional target.
Imprisons a demon, beast, or humanoid, incapacitating them for 1 min. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1.
You heal for 4% of all Fire damage you deal.
Unleash an eruption of fel energy, dealing 50,570 Chaos damage and stunning all nearby enemies for 2 sec.
Increases the range of Disrupt to 10 yds.
Increases your chance to parry by 3%.
Throw Glaive has 2 charges and 10 yard increased range.

Charge to your target and deal 147,925 Fire damage.

Fracture has a chance to reset the cooldown of Felblade.

Generates 40 Fury.
Mastery increases your movement speed.

Leech increased by 10%.

Gain an additional 10% leech while Metamorphosis is active.
Immolation Aura increases your armor by 20% and causes melee attackers to suffer 21,909 Fire damage.
Reduces magic damage taken by 5%.
Fel Devastation causes you to enter demon form for 5 sec after it finishes dealing damage.
Increases maximum health by 5%.
Increases your mastery by 3.6%.

Summons darkness around you in an 8 yd radius, granting friendly targets a 15% chance to avoid all damage from an attack. Lasts 8 sec.

Chance to avoid damage increased by 100% when not in a raid.
Afflicting an enemy with a Sigil generates 1 Lesser Soul Fragment.
All Sigils activate 1 second faster.
Reduces the cooldown of Metamorphosis by 60 sec.
Enemies deal 8% reduced magic damage to you for 8 sec after being afflicted by one of your Sigils.
Sigil of Flame deals 70% increased damage and generates 2 additional Fury per target hit.

Charge to your target, striking them for 1.1 million Chaos damage, rooting them in place for 1.5 sec and inflicting 900,464 Chaos damage over 6 sec to up to 5 enemies in your path. 

The pursuit invigorates your soul, healing you for 25% of the damage you deal to your Hunt target for 20 sec.

Place a demonic sigil at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

Detonates to deal 859,702 Chaos damage and shatter up to 3 Lesser Soul Fragments from enemies affected by the sigil. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Unleash the fel within you, damaging enemies directly in front of you for 545,977 Fire damage over 2 sec. Causing damage also heals you for up to 771,222 health.

Enemies struck by Sigil of Flame are afflicted with Frailty for 6 sec.

You heal for 8% of all damage you deal to targets with Frailty.
Brand an enemy with a demonic symbol, instantly dealing 380,435 Fire damage and 354,630 Fire damage over 12 sec. The enemy's damage done to you is reduced by 40% for 12 sec.

Rapidly slash your target for 253,542 Physical damage, and shatter 2 Lesser Soul Fragments from them.

Generates 25 Fury.
Demon Spikes also increases your Parry chance by 10% for 10 sec.

Sigil of Flame's initial damage is increased by 50%.

Multiple applications of Sigil of Flame may overlap.
You take 12% reduced damage after Demon Spikes ends, fading by 1% per second.

Place a Sigil of Silence at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

Silences all enemies affected by the sigil for 4 sec.
Immolation Aura increases your movement speed by 10% and its duration is increased by 50%.
Increases the duration of Demon Spikes by 2 sec.
Fire damage increased by 8%.

Frailty now also reduces all damage you take from afflicted targets by 3%.

Enemies struck by Soul Cleave are afflicted with Frailty for 6 sec.
Immolation Aura's initial burst has a chance to shatter Lesser Soul Fragments from enemies.
You take 10% reduced magic damage while Immolation Aura is active.

Consuming a Soul Fragment reduces all damage you take by 2% for 6 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.

Place a Sigil of Chains at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

All enemies affected by the sigil are pulled to its center and are snared, reducing movement speed by 70% for 8 sec.
Fiery Brand also increases Fire damage you deal to the target by 30%.
Increases the duration of your Sigils by 2 sec and radius by 2 yds.
Soul Cleave deals 50% increased damage to your primary target.
Every 1 sec, Fiery Brand spreads to one nearby enemy.
Frailty now also increases all damage you deal to afflicted targets by 4%.
Consuming a Soul Fragment reduces the remaining cooldown of Demon Spikes by 0.35 sec.
Immolation Aura damage increases the duration of your Fiery Brand and Sigil of Flame by 0.50 sec.

Multiple applications of Frailty may overlap.

Soul Cleave applies Frailty to your primary target for 8 sec.

Sustaining fatal damage instead transforms you to Metamorphosis form.

This may occur once every 8 min.

Sigil of Flame has 5 sec reduced cooldown and 1 additional charge.

You have 12% increased chance to parry attacks from enemies afflicted by your Sigil of Flame.

Consuming 20 Soul Fragments or casting The Hunt converts your next Throw Glaive into Reaver's Glaive.

 Reaver's Glaive: 
Throw a glaive enhanced with the essence of consumed souls at your target, dealing 586,360 Physical damage and ricocheting to 3 additional enemies.
 
Begins a well-practiced pattern of glaivework, enhancing your next Fracture and Soul Cleave.

The enhanced ability you cast first deals 10% increased damage, and the second deals 20% increased damage.

Generates 20 Fury.

When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Soul Cleave casts 3 additional glaive slashes to nearby targets. 

If cast after Fracture, cast 6 slashes instead.
Vengeful Retreat can be cast a second time within 3 sec.

When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Fracture applies Reaver's Mark, which causes the target to take 7% increased damage for 20 sec. 

If cast after Soul Cleave, Reaver's Mark is increased to 14%.
The second enhanced ability in a pattern shatters an additional Soul Fragment.
Each Soul Fragment you consume shields you for an additional 10% of the amount healed.

Expose weaknesses in the target of your Reaver's Mark, causing your Physical damage to any enemy to also deal 20% of the damage dealt to your marked target as Chaos, and sometimes shatter a Lesser Soul Fragment.
Soul Cleave deals 10% increased damage.
Reaver's Glaive generates 20 Fury.
Consuming a Soul Fragment causes your next Fracture to deal 47,875 additional Physical damage.
After consuming both enhancements, gain Thrill of the Fight, increasing your attack speed by 15% for 20 sec and your damage and healing by 15% for 10 sec.
Infernal Strike gains an additional charge.

Place a Sigil of Misery at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

Causes all enemies affected by the sigil to cower in fear, disorienting them for 17 sec.
The healing of Shattered Souls is increased by 10%.
Imprisons a demon, beast, or humanoid, incapacitating them for 1 min. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1.
You heal for 4% of all Fire damage you deal.
Increases the range of Disrupt to 10 yds.
Increases your chance to parry by 3%.
Increases the critical strike chance of Immolation Aura by 6%.
Mastery increases your movement speed.

Leech increased by 10%.

Gain an additional 10% leech while Metamorphosis is active.
Immolation Aura increases your armor by 20% and causes melee attackers to suffer 22,281 Fire damage.
Reduces magic damage taken by 5%.
Fel Devastation causes you to enter demon form for 5 sec after it finishes dealing damage.
Increases maximum health by 5%.
Increases your mastery by 3.6%.
Afflicting an enemy with a Sigil generates 1 Lesser Soul Fragment.
The cooldown of Infernal Strike is reduced by 20%.
Enemies deal 8% reduced magic damage to you for 8 sec after being afflicted by one of your Sigils.

Charge to your target, striking them for 1.1 million Chaos damage, rooting them in place for 1.5 sec and inflicting 900,464 Chaos damage over 6 sec to up to 5 enemies in your path. 

The pursuit invigorates your soul, healing you for 25% of the damage you deal to your Hunt target for 20 sec.
All Sigils activate 1 second faster.
Unleash the fel within you, damaging enemies directly in front of you for 543,856 Fire damage over 2 sec. Causing damage also heals you for up to 755,625 health.

Enemies struck by Sigil of Flame are afflicted with Frailty for 6 sec.

You heal for 8% of all damage you deal to targets with Frailty.
Brand an enemy with a demonic symbol, instantly dealing 381,794 Fire damage and 354,630 Fire damage over 12 sec. The enemy's damage done to you is reduced by 40% for 12 sec.

Rapidly slash your target for 254,727 Physical damage, and shatter 2 Lesser Soul Fragments from them.

Generates 25 Fury.
Demon Spikes also increases your Parry chance by 10% for 10 sec.

Place a demonic sigil at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

Detonates to deal 841,306 Chaos damage and shatter up to 3 Lesser Soul Fragments from enemies affected by the sigil. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Reduces the cooldown of Throw Glaive by 6 sec.
You take 12% reduced damage after Demon Spikes ends, fading by 1% per second.

Place a Sigil of Silence at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

Silences all enemies affected by the sigil for 4 sec.

Consume up to 5 available Soul Fragments then explode, damaging nearby enemies for 67,098 Fire damage per fragment consumed, and afflicting them with Frailty for 6 sec, causing you to heal for 8% of damage you deal to them. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Immolation Aura increases your movement speed by 10% and its duration is increased by 50%.
Increases the duration of Demon Spikes by 2 sec.
Fire damage increased by 8%.
When Fiery Brand expires on your primary target, you gain a shield that absorbs up 1 million damage for 15 sec, based on your damage dealt to them while Fiery Brand was active.
Immolation Aura's initial burst has a chance to shatter Lesser Soul Fragments from enemies.

Consuming a Soul Fragment reduces all damage you take by 2% for 6 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Fiery Brand also increases Fire damage you deal to the target by 30%.
Soul Cleave deals 50% increased damage to your primary target.
Every 1 sec, Fiery Brand spreads to one nearby enemy.
Frailty now also increases all damage you deal to afflicted targets by 4%.
Immolation Aura damage increases the duration of your Fiery Brand and Sigil of Flame by 0.50 sec.

Multiple applications of Frailty may overlap.

Soul Cleave applies Frailty to your primary target for 8 sec.

Carve into the soul of your target, dealing 566,072 Fire damage and an additional 248,842 Fire damage over 3 sec.  Immediately shatters 3 Lesser Soul Fragments from the target and 1 additional Lesser Soul Fragment every 1 sec.
Fiery Brand has 12 sec reduced cooldown and 1 additional charge.
Infernal Strike gains an additional charge.

Place a Sigil of Misery at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

Causes all enemies affected by the sigil to cower in fear, disorienting them for 17 sec.
Increases maximum Fury by 20.
The healing of Shattered Souls is increased by 10%.
Throw Glaive ricochets to 1 additional target.
Imprisons a demon, beast, or humanoid, incapacitating them for 1 min. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1.
You heal for 4% of all Fire damage you deal.
Unleash an eruption of fel energy, dealing 51,012 Chaos damage and stunning all nearby enemies for 2 sec.
Increases the range of Disrupt to 10 yds.
Increases your chance to parry by 3%.
Throw Glaive has 2 charges and snares all enemies hit by 50% for 6 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of Immolation Aura by 6%.

When you parry an attack or have one of your attacks parried, restore 2% of max health and 10 Fury. 

This effect may only occur once every 5 sec.
Mastery increases your movement speed.

Leech increased by 10%.

Gain an additional 10% leech while Metamorphosis is active.
Immolation Aura increases your armor by 20% and causes melee attackers to suffer 22,493 Fire damage.

Blasts all enemies in front of you, for up to 930,019 Chaos damage over 1.6 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Your auto attacks deal an additional 22,229 Shadow damage and generate 7-12 Fury.
Immolation Aura generates an additional 36 Fury over 9 sec.
Blade Dance deals 298,788 Chaos damage to the first target struck.
Throw Glaive deals 60% increased damage, reduced by 30% for each previous enemy hit.
Magical damage increased by 3%, and Physical damage taken reduced by 5%.
Slip into the nether, increasing movement speed by 100% and becoming immune to damage, but unable to attack. Lasts 6 sec.
You deflect incoming attacks while Blade Dancing, absorbing damage up to 15% of your maximum health.

Damaging an enemy before they damage you increases your critical strike chance by 10% for 5 sec.

Vengeful Retreat refreshes your potential to trigger this effect on any enemies you are in combat with.
Increases Versatility by 4% and reduces threat generated by 8%.
When you activate Metamorphosis, the cooldowns of Blade Dance and Eye Beam are immediately reset.
Throw Glaive now costs 25 Fury and throws a second glaive at the target.
The final slash of Blade Dance inflicts an additional 93,070 Chaos damage over 4 sec.
Eye Beam generates 40 Fury every second, and its damage and duration are increased by 20%.
Eye Beam deals guaranteed critical strikes.
Immolation Aura's damage increases by 10% each time it deals damage.
When Eye Beam finishes fully channeling, your Haste is increased by an additional 10% for 10 sec.
Enemies hit by Chaos Strike or Throw Glaive take 15% increased damage from Chaos Strike and Throw Glaive for 15 sec.

Demon's Bite and Throw Glaive leave open wounds on your enemies, dealing 94,945 Chaos damage over 15 sec and increasing damage taken from your Immolation Aura by 40%.

May be applied to up to 3 targets.

Entering demon form causes your next Chaos Strike to unleash your inner demon, causing it to crash into your target and deal 275,334 Chaos damage to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Throw Glaive causes targets to take an additional 80% of damage dealt as Chaos over 6 sec.

Each time Immolation Aura deals damage, 30% of the damage dealt by up to 3 critical strikes is gathered as Ragefire.

When Immolation Aura expires you explode, dealing all stored Ragefire damage to nearby enemies.
Gain critical strike damage equal to 80% of your critical strike chance.
Activating Eye Beam reduces the cooldown of your next Eye Beam by 5.0 sec, stacking up to 20 sec.
Your Chaos damage has a 7.77% chance to be increased by 17%, occurring up to 7 total times.

Immolation Aura has 1 additional charge, 30% chance to refund a charge when used, and deals Chaos damage instead of Fire.

You can have multiple Immolation Auras active at a time.
Blade Dance automatically triggers Throw Glaive on your primary target for 100% damage and each slash has a 50% chance to Throw Glaive an enemy for 35% damage.

When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Soul Cleave casts 3 additional glaive slashes to nearby targets. 

If cast after Fracture, cast 6 slashes instead.
Vengeful Retreat resets the cooldown of Felblade.

When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Fracture applies Reaver's Mark, which causes the target to take 7% increased damage for 20 sec. 

If cast after Soul Cleave, Reaver's Mark is increased to 14%.
The second enhanced ability in a pattern shatters an additional Soul Fragment.
Felblade surrounds you with a Blade Ward, reducing damage taken by 10% for 5 sec.

Expose weaknesses in the target of your Reaver's Mark, causing your Physical damage to any enemy to also deal 20% of the damage dealt to your marked target as Chaos, and sometimes shatter a Lesser Soul Fragment.
Soul Cleave deals 10% increased damage.
Throw Glaive deals 23,937 Physical damage to enemies near its initial target.
Consuming a Soul Fragment causes your next Fracture to deal 47,875 additional Physical damage.
After consuming both enhancements, gain Thrill of the Fight, increasing your attack speed by 15% for 20 sec and your damage and healing by 15% for 10 sec.
Remove all snares and vault away. Nearby enemies take 27,043 Physical damage.
Infernal Strike gains an additional charge.

Place a Sigil of Misery at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

Causes all enemies affected by the sigil to cower in fear, disorienting them for 17 sec.
Increases maximum Fury by 20.
Throw Glaive ricochets to 1 additional target.
Imprisons a demon, beast, or humanoid, incapacitating them for 1 min. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1.
Unleash an eruption of fel energy, dealing 51,038 Chaos damage and stunning all nearby enemies for 2 sec.
Increases the range of Disrupt to 10 yds.
Consume 1 beneficial Magic effect removing it from the target.
Throw Glaive has 2 charges and snares all enemies hit by 50% for 6 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of Immolation Aura by 6%.
Mastery increases your movement speed.

Leech increased by 10%.

Gain an additional 10% leech while Metamorphosis is active.
Reduces magic damage taken by 5%.
Fel Devastation causes you to enter demon form for 5 sec after it finishes dealing damage.
Blasts all enemies in front of you, for up to 946,209 Chaos damage over 1.6 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
The chance that Chaos Strike will refund 20 Fury is increased by 30% of your critical strike chance.
Your auto attacks deal an additional 22,298 Shadow damage and generate 7-12 Fury.

Summons darkness around you in an 8 yd radius, granting friendly targets a 15% chance to avoid all damage from an attack. Lasts 8 sec.
